content: **please leave a comment and let me know what you think ** an excellent way to celebrate without setting things on fire this cute crocheted tea light cover works up very quickly and can be decorated in a million different ways perfect for birthdays weddings baby showers or just to say congratulations these would make lovely table decorations for an outside event or a night light for a little one let your imagination go wild have your cake and light it up too if you are unsure about how to do surface crochet for the top edging see the surface crochet tutorial 1 pattern note as of june 25 2011 this pattern has not been tested the original pattern i posted was updated to look a whole lot better and i clarified a few awkward sentences please send me a message if you find any errors or anything is unclear thanks 1 http //www crochetspot com/how-to-crochet-surface-crochet-or-surface-slip-stitch/
